# automatic

**Type Property**

A behavior that matches the system default behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
static var automatic: ImmersiveEnvironmentBehavior { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this value with the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Scene/immersiveEnvironmentBehavior(_:)] scene modifier to define that the system follows a default behavior regarding the system’s immersive environment when your app opens a scene.
title: automatic
